name: @rainbowlaces/base
description: An extensible and modular Node.js framework for building scalable web applications with built-in support for routing, middleware, configuration management, and more, designed for simplicity and ease of use.

scripts.build: tsc && npm run babel:all && npm run copyPublic
scripts.babel:all: npm run babel:client && npm run babel:server
scripts.start:dev: NODE_ENV=development node --inspect -r source-map-support/register -r dotenv/config dist/testApp/src/index.js 2>&1 | node ./dev/logFormatter.js
scripts.start:dev:watch: nodemon --watch 'src/**/*' --exec 'npm run build:dev && npm run start:dev'
scripts.build:dev: tsc && npm run babel:dev:all && npm run copyPublic
scripts.babel:dev:all: npm run babel:dev:client && npm run babel:dev:server
scripts.copyPublic: cp -r src/testApp/src/public dist/testApp/src && rm -rf dist/testApp/src/public/components && mv dist/testApp/src/components dist/testApp/src/public/components
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:dev:clean: npm run clean && npm run build:dev
scripts.build:test: npm run build:dev && npm run test
scripts.full: npm run lint && npm run build:clean && npm run test
